text:
Hello everbody!
I'm using this componet
``` {
  "type": "crm::table",
  "objectTypeId": "contacts",
  "properties": [
    "email",
    "HubSpot_owner_id",
    "firstname",
    "lastname"
  ],
  "pageSize": 3
}.```
However it returns all data from the contacts table. Would it be possible to make a filter and bring only the data I need?
Hi Heitor, this component does not allow filtering, yet. We are looking into providing better solution for this
